column1: Little Goat Diner////Cocktails at 9:30 on a Sunday?  You bet!  My friends opted for a carafe of mimosas
column2: but I was too enthusiastic about the cocktail list and ordered the "Backyard BBQ
column3: which was refreshing, strong, and well made.  The cocktail list is much longer than what's on the Little Goat website (although that too is lengthy!)
